name: Triwizard Trials
description:
Fight the elemental beasts of the tundra, turning their own magic against them. Leave one of your fellows behind after each fight to hold back the forces of darkness, as you forge on with your trial.

Our entry for the Games Jobs Live Game Jam.

Programming/Music/Artwork - Joe Darcy (Triangle)

Sound Design - Benshai Kenchington

Producer & QA - Rosie Campbell (exophagious)
